mapper.sql: doctorId, outpatientId, picHead, doctorName, position, special, section, doctorIntro, flag, sex, graduInstitution, tutorQualification, degree, marjor, partTimeAcademic, certificateHold, isFamilyDoc, telephone, relNubCount
mapper.select: SELECT doctor.doctorId, doctor.doctorName, releasenum.date, releasenum.realseId FROM doctor, releasenum WHERE doctor.outpatientId=#{value} AND doctor.doctorId = releasenum.doctorId;

select
distinct
from doctor
order by ${orderByClause}
